Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cell as an emerging star has attracted lots of attention because of its great potential in energy conversion and storage as well as reducing CO2 emissions.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: However, the traditional oxygen electrode (La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta, LSCF) still faces insufficient activity for oxygen reduction and oxygen evolution reaction as well as instability due to Sr segregation.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Herein, a simple strategy is adopted to improve the catalytic activity and stability by coating Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+delta (PNCO) layer onto LSCF oxygen electrode (PNCO-LSCF).
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The cell with PNCO-LSCF oxygen electrode achieves a maximum power density of 1.358 W/cm(2) at 750?, exhibiting a significant performance promotion compared with bare LSCF oxygen electrode (0.907 W/cm(2)) in fuel cell mode.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The cell also presents a high electrolysis current density of 1.953 A/cm(2) at 1.5 V with 50% H2O at 750?, leads to a reduction of R-p from 0.141 omega center dot cm(2) to 0.105 omega center dot cm(2) after coating in electrolysis cell mode.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, PNCO-LSCF single cell exhibits long-term stability of 160 h under reversible operation mode without noticeable degradation.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Therefore, coating LSCF with PNCO has been proven to be an effective method to achieve high performance.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: It also opens a door for the modification of the electrode in other fields such as metal air battery, water splitting etc.
Titulo: Nano film Pr2Ni0.8Cu0.2O4+d decorated La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-d oxygen electrode for highly efficient and stable reversible solid oxide cells
